metadata.synopsis: At the end of the queue leading to the South span’s checkpoint is a young journalist taking note and quotes from the poor souls trying to get into Baldur’s Gate.Lens, a female tiefling in a worn overcoat, can simply be a quiet news worker taking the beat of the outside city (because someone has to tell the true story).
metadata.how_to_trigger: 1) Open debugbook2) Got to Region3) Act 34) Wyrm's Crossing5) Bridge Checkpoint6.0) oe OIStartOrinJournalist to start the dialog (do the other steps below first if you want them enabled)6.1) oe OIEnableOrinJournalist to enable journal as Orin6.2) oe OIMetOrinOnce to enable that you've met Orin in previous impersonation.

33.text: Aren't you - I knew there was a story here, and there you are, the hero of the hour, walking right up to me.

65.text: The name's Lens, reporter with the Baldur's Mouth Gazette. Care to do a quick interview?
65.context: CinematicNodeContext: Taking out a notebook and quillNodeContext: Pacy, excited - wants to get things moving quickly

24.speaker: Player
24.text: Hold on. What do you want with me?
24.context: CinematicNodeContext: Lens makes some notes. [LOGAN] Check with Greg, V.O performance similar to established pose of Lens writing.

2.text: I'm here looking for my next angle, but it's all the same - oppression, famine, death. I need something new. Someone like you.
2.context: CinematicNodeContext: Lens makes some notes. [LOGAN] Check with Greg, V.O performance similar to established pose of Lens writing.

14.text: It won't take more than two moments of your time. If you play your cards right, this could make the cover. I just need some extra details.
14.context: CinematicNodeContext: Lens makes some notes. [LOGAN] Check with Greg, V.O performance similar to established pose of Lens writing.

68.text: So, you've arrived in Baldur's Gate. What's brought you here at a time like this?
68.context: CinematicNodeContext: Lens makes some notes. [LOGAN] Check with Greg, V.O performance similar to established pose of Lens writing.

89.speaker: Player
89.text: I've come to save the city.
89.context: CinematicNodeContext: Lens makes some notes. [LOGAN] Check with Greg, V.O performance similar to established pose of Lens writing.

35.text: You have? But I thought our soon-to-be Lord Gortash had things in hand?
35.context: CinematicNodeContext: Lens makes some notes. [LOGAN] Check with Greg, V.O performance similar to established pose of Lens writing.

18.text: Though, if anyone could help him, it would be you. You've a knack for finding chinks in the Absolute's armour.

63.speaker: Player
63.text: My life's in danger. I've come to find a way to save myself.
63.context: CinematicNodeContext: Lens makes some notes. [LOGAN] Check with Greg, V.O performance similar to established pose of Lens writing.

99.text: You came seeking safety in a city under siege? The threat must be dire indeed.
99.context: CinematicNodeContext: Lens makes some notes. [LOGAN] Check with Greg, V.O performance similar to established pose of Lens writing.

69.text: Though from what I hear, you've little to fear from the Absolute.
69.context: NodeContext: mentioning "Th Absolute" here should sound like a pivot - she's assuming this is the threat referred to

40.speaker: Player
40.text: Oh you know, taking a holiday, visiting family. Normal reasons.
40.context: CinematicNodeContext: Lens makes some notes. [LOGAN] Check with Greg, V.O performance similar to established pose of Lens writing.

37.text: Everybody needs a rest from time to time, even seasoned adventurers like yourself.
37.context: CinematicNodeContext: Lens makes some notes. [LOGAN] Check with Greg, V.O performance similar to established pose of Lens writing.

72.text: I imagine you've a need to let off some steam after your recent adventures in the shadow-cursed lands.

31.speaker: Player
31.text: My intentions aren't fit for printing. Trust me.
31.context: CinematicNodeContext: Lens makes some notes. [LOGAN] Check with Greg, V.O performance similar to established pose of Lens writing.

53.text: You're planning to indulge yourself in some of the darker corners of the city. No need to hide anything - we're all sinners by someone's yardstick.
53.context: CinematicNodeContext: Lens makes some notes. [LOGAN] Check with Greg, V.O performance similar to established pose of Lens writing.

103.speaker: Player
103.text: I... have to see an old acquaintance.
103.context: CinematicNodeContext: Lens makes some notes. [LOGAN] Check with Greg, V.O performance similar to established pose of Lens writing.

19.text: How wonderful. No doubt your reunion will be filled with tales from your recent adventures in the shadow-cursed lands.

67.speaker: Player
67.text: Let's just say I'm here to leave my mark on the city. All will know of Gale of Waterdeep, soon enough.
67.context: CinematicNodeContext: Lens makes some notes. [LOGAN] Check with Greg, V.O performance similar to established pose of Lens writing.

55.text: Sounds like you're planning to make quite the impression. Only to be expected, given your feats in the shadow-cursed lands.

97.speaker: Player
97.text: I live here. Or did, anyway. This homecoming has been a long time coming.
97.context: CinematicNodeContext: Lens makes some notes. [LOGAN] Check with Greg, V.O performance similar to established pose of Lens writing.

16.text: You must have been dreaming of this day for some time. No doubt the thought kept you going despite the perils you faced to get here.
16.context: CinematicNodeContext: Lens makes some notes. [LOGAN] Check with Greg, V.O performance similar to established pose of Lens writing.

26.text: My sources tell me you recently vanquished the fearsome General Ketheric Thorm. How did you manage that?
26.context: CinematicNodeContext: Lens makes some notes. [LOGAN] Check with Greg, V.O performance similar to established pose of Lens writing.

61.speaker: Player
61.text: How in the Hells do you know about that?
61.context: CinematicNodeContext: Lens makes some notes. [LOGAN] Check with Greg, V.O performance similar to established pose of Lens writing.

52.text: I'm a journalist. It's my job to know everything.
52.context: CinematicNodeContext: Lens makes some notes. [LOGAN] Check with Greg, V.O performance similar to established pose of Lens writing.

41.text: Unfortunately the version I heard was light on details. So what did you do to Ketheric?

20.speaker: Player
20.text: I fought with everything I had. He was a formidable foe wielding terrible power.
20.context: CinematicNodeContext: Lens makes some notes. [LOGAN] Check with Greg, V.O performance similar to established pose of Lens writing.

36.text: Formidable? You're just being modest. I heard you swatted him aside like a fly from a corpse.
36.context: CinematicNodeContext: Lens makes some notes. [LOGAN] Check with Greg, V.O performance similar to established pose of Lens writing.

22.text: You'll deal with the remaining Absolutists in much the same way, I suppose.
22.context: CinematicNodeContext: With a malicious smile. [LOGAN] Orin / Lens begins to drop the act. She winds down her writing.NodeContext: ominous

43.text: The cult's threat is far from extinguished. What's your plan of attack?
43.context: CinematicNodeContext: With a malicious smile. [LOGAN] Orin / Lens begins to drop the act. She winds down her writing.NodeContext: ominous

73.speaker: Player
73.text: What makes you think I'm planning on attacking them?
73.context: CinematicNodeContext: With a malicious smile. [LOGAN] Orin / Lens begins to drop the act. She winds down her writing.NodeContext: ominous

91.text: I don't imagine they'll give you much choice, after you killed their general. Better to be on the front foot, surely?

11.text: You must have some strategy in mind?

12.speaker: Player
12.text: I'm going to cut that rotten cult off at the head - take out its leaders.
12.context: CinematicNodeContext: With a malicious smile. [LOGAN] Orin / Lens begins to drop the act. She winds down her writing.NodeContext: ominous

94.text: Gortash, maybe. You'll find me much harder to kill...
94.context: CinematicNodeContext: With a malicious smile. [LOGAN] Orin / Lens begins to drop the act. She winds down her writing.NodeContext: ominous

4.speaker: Player
4.text: I've no interest in the Absolute. I'm here strictly on personal matters.
4.context: CinematicNodeContext: With a malicious smile. [LOGAN] Orin / Lens begins to drop the act. She winds down her writing.NodeContext: ominous

32.context: CinematicNodeContext: With a malicious smile. [LOGAN] Orin / Lens begins to drop the act. She winds down her writing.NodeContext: ominous

54.speaker: Player
54.text: Not much of a planner, I'm afraid. More of an improviser.
54.context: CinematicNodeContext: With a malicious smile. [LOGAN] Orin / Lens begins to drop the act. She winds down her writing.NodeContext: ominous

8.text: You think chaos courses through your veins? You have no idea...
8.context: CinematicNodeContext: With a malicious smile. [LOGAN] Orin / Lens begins to drop the act. She winds down her writing.NodeContext: ominous

45.text: Look at it, come crawling home, hands stained with the Bone Lord's soot. And you carry his stone.
45.context: CinematicNodeContext: The journalist's body jerks as she transforms, wildshape-style into Orin the Red.

5.text: Look at it, come crawling home, hands stained with the Bone Lord's soot. And you carry his stone.
5.context: CinematicNodeContext: The journalist's body jerks as she transforms, wildshape-style into Orin the Red.

56.text: Look at it, come crawling home, hands stained with the Bone Lord's soot. And you carry his stone.
56.context: NodeContext: 'It' is the Dark Urge player. 'Home' at this point is just the city, not yet the temple. 'Bone Lord's soot' refers to the player having killed Ketheric (his god Myrkul is the Lord of Bones)

21.text: You come for mine too, slaughter-kin. And I hunger for yours.
21.context: NodeContext: Player previously revealed their plan to Orin. She knows they want her netherstone. Likes the idea they want to challenge her

1.text: Your purpose is clear as welts on an infant's skin: you come for our Netherstones next.
1.context: NodeContext: Player didn't tell Orin they want her netherstone - she thinks they lied, and is amused by it. Proof of how pathetic they are.

77.text: I could end it now - but I'll be patient. Father will see us together again. He will see you bleed.
77.context: CinematicNodeContext: Orin twists her ring and disappears.NodeContext: Toying with the player, trying to make them uneasy, establish her power over them. 'Father' is Bhaal.

23.text: So you're the lickspittle who crushed the Bone Lord's thrall.
23.context: NodeContext: First time Orin meets player. 'Bone Lord's thrall' is Ketheric, who player previously killed. Curious.

13.text: Have you come beg-begging, sniffing for our stones? Gortash won't like that. A throat his black hand can't choke the spit from.
13.context: NodeContext: Mocking, finds your plan ridiculous but enjoys the chaos it will cause. 'Stones' are the netherstones. 'Black hand' reference to the 'Black Hand of Bane', Gortash's god.

96.text: When you find the lordling, tell him Orin is watching.
96.context: CinematicNodeContext: Orin twists her ring and disappears.NodeContext: Playful, menacing. Trying to make player uneasy - she could be hiding anywhere.

82.text: I know the truth: you come for our Netherstones. Come to prise one from the tyrant's death grip, pluck the other from my rotted carcass.

47.text: I see how you slip-slither closer, belly dragging in the filth. Father is laughing at you.

101.text: I see how you slip-slither closer, belly dragging in the filth. Father is laughing at you.
101.context: NodeContext: Second time Orin appeared to toy with you. She can't believe you're wasting so much time.

95.text: You think you're fit to wield the stones? A slipshod butcher, dull-skulled, unable to think, to create, to worship.
95.context: NodeContext: Player previously revealed their plan to Orin. Giving you a dressing down - all the ways you're inferior to her

48.text: You think you can hide your purpose. You are a brutish butcher, your blunted skull has no vision for deceit.
48.context: NodeContext: Player didn't tell Orin they want her netherstone - she thinks they lied. Giving you a dressing down - all the ways you're inferior to her. 'Blunted skull' alluding to the tadpole in your brain.

58.text: Do not worry, slaughter kin. My blades are still sharp and sweet. They will greet you soon enough.
58.context: CinematicNodeContext: Orin twists her ring and disappears.NodeContext: Mocking reassurance - trying to make the player uneasy.

83.text: Still rolling in the muck, I see.

17.text: You shed your secrets so easily. No matter - your clumsy purpose is clear enough already.

86.text: Gortash knows you are coming. Knows you have the Bone Lord's stone. Do not let him hiss hot air into your worm-weakened brain.
86.context: NodeContext: Acting like she's helping you, but just trying to freak you out. 'Bone Lord's stone' is Ketheric's netherstone

49.text: Remember - his throat spits lies, but my blade carves the truth. You will read it on your skin soon enough.
49.context: CinematicNodeContext: Orin twists her ring and disappears.NodeContext: toying with the player, knows the 'truth' about them and is enjoying holding this against them

51.text: You think I can't sniff the secrets hidden in your pretty skull? What you seek. What you need.

10.speaker: Player
10.text: Be as water. Move as a river - strike like a tsunami. I will drown this fetid cult.
10.context: CinematicNodeContext: With a malicious smile [LOGAN] Orin / Lens begins to drop the act. She winds down her writing.NodeContext: Ominous

81.speaker: Player
81.text: I hardly want my strategy printed all over the front pages, do I?
81.context: CinematicNodeContext: With a malicious smile [LOGAN] Orin / Lens begins to drop the act. She winds down her writing.NodeContext: Ominous

90.text: Perhaps it could inspire some like-minded citizens to help your cause.

39.speaker: Player
39.text: I've had enough. This interview's over.
39.context: CinematicNodeContext: With a malicious smile [LOGAN] Orin / Lens begins to drop the act. She winds down her writing.NodeContext: Ominous

42.text: Don't worry. I already have everything I need.
42.context: CinematicNodeContext: With a malicious smile [LOGAN] Orin / Lens begins to drop the act. She winds down her writing.NodeContext: Ominous

74.speaker: Player
74.text: I offered him a chance at redemption. When he refused to take it, he left me no choice.
74.context: CinematicNodeContext: Lens makes some notes. [LOGAN] Check with Greg, V.O performance similar to established pose of Lens writing.

46.text: So you were forced to kill him? What a tragic story.
46.context: CinematicNodeContext: Lens makes some notes. [LOGAN] Check with Greg, V.O performance similar to established pose of Lens writing.

60.text: Unfortunately, Absolutists rarely seem interested in compromise.

38.speaker: Player
38.text: Ketheric's hubris was his downfall. I was merely the catalyst.
38.context: CinematicNodeContext: Lens makes some notes. [LOGAN] Check with Greg, V.O performance similar to established pose of Lens writing.

34.text: I'm sure you were much more than that. You proved to be quite the thorn in his side.
34.context: CinematicNodeContext: Lens makes some notes. [LOGAN] Check with Greg, V.O performance similar to established pose of Lens writing.

84.text: His Absolutist friends can't be very happy with you.

15.speaker: Player
15.text: I ground his bones to dust. Even his god could not save him.
15.context: CinematicNodeContext: Lens makes some notes. [LOGAN] Check with Greg, V.O performance similar to established pose of Lens writing.

27.text: Defying the gods themselves? I had no idea.
27.context: CinematicNodeContext: Lens makes some notes. [LOGAN] Check with Greg, V.O performance similar to established pose of Lens writing.

50.text: Taking out one of the Absolute's generals was no mean feat. You must feel confident for the battles ahead.

29.speaker: Player
29.text: I drowned him in a darkness older and more profound than any he claimed to command.

100.speaker: Player
100.text: Sorry, I'm saving that story for my memoirs.

76.text: Then consider this a taste of what's to come. You must be able to share something about Ketheric's downfall?

9.speaker: Player
9.text: Consider me an emissary of my people.
9.context: CinematicNodeContext: Lens makes some notes. [LOGAN] Check with Greg, V.O performance similar to established pose of Lens writing.

87.text: And a noble and powerful people they must be, to be represented by one of your impressive experience.

80.speaker: Player
80.text: I need to return to some... colleagues, let's call them. They're expecting me.
80.context: CinematicNodeContext: Lens makes some notes. [LOGAN] Check with Greg, V.O performance similar to established pose of Lens writing.

57.text: Returning to the fold with plenty of tales to tell, I'm sure. Not least about your adventures in the shadow-cursed lands.
57.context: CinematicNodeContext: Lens makes some notes. [LOGAN] Check with Greg, V.O performance similar to established pose of Lens writing.

98.speaker: Player
98.text: I have... family business to attend to.

28.text: And any family would be proud to have such a son representing them. Especially after your exploits in the shadow-cursed lands.

64.text: A portentous arrival then. Your inheritance awaits - one you feel you've earned ten times over, I don't doubt.

85.text: Look, I'm going to write this piece with or without your input. It'll be much more accurate if you answer my questions.

93.text: You must have some plans once you enter the city?

88.text: You, of course. News travels fast in this city, and after your exploits, you're quite the celebrity. This interview will be our biggest issue yet.

62.speaker: Player
62.text: Quickly, then. I've urgent business in the city.

102.text: And I wouldn't dream of keeping you from it.

79.speaker: Player
79.text: Where to begin... Well, I was born the year of a poor harvest...

6.text: Let me stop you there. We'll need to be a bit more focused. Word counts, you know.

59.text: How about I ask a few questions, and you just tell me the first thing that comes into your head?

92.text: You don't trust journalists? I'm not like the others - your words are safe with me.
